trans-unit.source: Represents a data view in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma exibição de dados no armazenamento de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView> class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView> classe é um dos vários tipos que representam o esquema de um repositório de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
trans-unit.target: Esses itens de esquema são disponibilizadas para controles pelos designers de implementar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.

trans-unit.source: Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
trans-unit.target: Controla o acesso a objetos de esquema chamando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> método da interface.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView> class represents a single data view in the data store.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView> classe representa uma única exibição de dados no repositório de dados.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView> objects is returned when you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method with the `schemaClass` parameter set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView> objetos é retornado ao chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> método com o `schemaClass` parâmetro definido como <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView" /> class with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView" /> com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The data-store owner of the view.
trans-unit.target: O proprietário do armazenamento de dados da exibição.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView" /> class with the specified name and owner.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView" /> com o nome e proprietário especificados.
